task.string: What age were you when you first got symptoms from your inflammatory disease (e.g. lupus, vasculitis or Behçet’s syndrome)?

Before my physical health symptoms started
At the same time as my physical health symptoms started, but before my diagnosis
Around the time of my diagnosis
Weeks or months after my diagnosis

Skin changes e.g. rashes or ulcers
I have not had symptoms in the past month

I generally notice my brain symptoms starting or worsening BEFORE my physical symptoms start or worsen
I generally notice my brain symptoms starting or worsening AFTER my physical symptoms start or worsen
I generally notice my brain symptoms starting or worsening AT THE SAME TIME AS my physical symptoms start or worsen (that is, within 1 day of each other)
There doesn’t seem to be any relationship between my physical symptoms and brain symptoms
